001package edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.net.Uri;
005import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
008import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.R;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.adapter.MeetingAdapter;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.databinding.ActivityLandingBinding;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.CodeChallengeHelper;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.service.ZoomMeetingRepository;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.zoomattendance.viewmodel.ZoomMeetingViewModel;
015
016@AndroidEntryPoint
017public class LandingActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
018
019  private static final String ZOOM_OAUTH_URI = "https://zoom.us/oauth/authorize";
020  private ZoomMeetingViewModel viewModel;
021  private ActivityLandingBinding binding;
022
023  @Override
024  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
025    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
026    binding = ActivityLandingBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
027    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
028//    openLogin();
029    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this)
030        .get(ZoomMeetingViewModel.class);
031    viewModel.getZoomMeetings()
032        .observe(this,
033            (meetings) -> binding.meetings.setAdapter(new MeetingAdapter(this, meetings)));
034  }
035
036  private void openLogin() {
037    Uri uri = Uri.parse(ZOOM_OAUTH_URI)
038        .buildUpon()
039        .appendQueryParameter("code_challenge",
040            CodeChallengeHelper.getCodeChallenge(CodeChallengeHelper.createCodeVerifier()))
041        .appendQueryParameter("code_challenge_method", "S256")
042        .build();
043    Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uri);
044    startActivity(intent);
045  }
046
047  private void initializeSdk() {
048    //ZoomSDK
049  }
050}
